title: The developer shall before acceptance of his scheme/s by C
clause_text: The developer shall before acceptance of his scheme/s by C.E.O., S.R.A., open and maintain a separate account for each scheme and such account shall only be exclusively used for all receipts and expenditure of the scheme.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
